long_description: at performance authority, we strive to provide the best levels of service to all our customers ensuring they enjoy a safe and pleasant driving experience. we offer an extensive range of diesel engine repair and maintenance services for trucks and cars of all makes and models all under one roof. we specialize in car services including wheel alignment service, car body repair, engine repair, and oil change services. when we say your vehicle's in the best hands possible, we're not just saying what you want to hear. with a combined experince of nearly 60 years, residents throughout the local area have turned to performance authority for all of their automotive repair needs. with timely estimates and fast turnaround times, we are known for our personal service and expertise in all forms of specialized engine repair. we are here to be your trusted mechanical team whether you need an oil service, inspection, brake service, engine or transmission replacement and so much more. we upgrade, service, maintain and repair ford / chevy / dodge diesel trucks.
